section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on August 27, 2024.*
section.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
section.text: In applying and construing this uniform act, a court shall consider the promotion of the uniformity of the law among jurisdictions that enact it.
